translations: 排泄，排泄物；分泌，分泌物

sentences.sentence: Historically, textile dyes were made from such natural sources as plants and animal excretions.
sentences.translation: 在历史上，纺织染料是由植物和动物排泄物等天然资源制成的。

sentences.sentence: Our toilets will check our excretions for telltale signs of disease, he suggests. M.
sentences.translation: 他认为厕所将能够检测我们的排泄物以发现疾病的迹象。

sentences.sentence: Our toilets will check our excretions for telltale signs of disease, he suggests. M.R.I.
sentences.translation: 他认为厕所将能够检测我们的排泄物以发现疾病的迹象。
